name: Me Lost
description:
INTRODUCTION

Did you ever feel lost in an airport? Yes? Did you ever wish for an invisible hand to drive you out of that mess? This is what Me Lost is about. Try to be the benevolent god who helps people find their items and get out of there!

COMMANDS

Right Click - Move the camera around

Scroll Wheel - Zoom in & Out

Left Click & Drag on a character to set its path

CREDITS

This game was made by 6 people for the Global Game Jam 2021 - Chapter Catania

Andrea Di Bartolo : 3D Art / Art Direction

Samuele Padalino :  Coding

Claudio Scamporlino : Coding

Emanuele Toscano:  Sound Effects / Music

Stefania Urrata: 2D Art

Serena Rapisarda: 3D Art
